item.title: Malaysian Cinema consumer behavior Analysis using Python
item.description: Project Motivation The motivation of the project is to understand more about the movie goers in Malaysia, get some insights from it, and to improve my data analysis/manipulation skill set using Python.

item.title: Chatbot AI using Neural networks - Education pathway in Malaysia
item.description: Introduction and Project Motivation Majority of the youngsters today (including myself) do not have a clear pathway what they wan to specialize in after their academic career.
